homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
  if ($.jStorage.get('termsCondition') == null || $.jStorage.get('termsCondition') == undefined) {
    var e = document.getElementsByClassName("app")[0];
    var $injector = angular.element(e).injector();
    var $location = $injector.get('$location');
    $location.path("/app/TermsCondition/TermsCondition");
  } else {
    $.jStorage.set('termsCondition', true);
    var e = document.getElementsByClassName("app")[0];
    var $injector = angular.element(e).injector();
    var $location = $injector.get('$location');
    $location.path("/app/RegistrationCart/RegistrationCart");
  }


  try {
    StatusBar.backgroundColorByHexString("#252729");
  } catch (e) {}
  MyCampusApp.rootScope.mobileAppName = "Owens Mobile";
</script>
<script>
  try {
    if (!MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded) {
      console.log(MyCampusApp);
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeStart", function(event, next, current) {
        //alert(event);
        $(".app-body").removeClass("slideInDown");
        $(".app-body").removeClass("slideInRight");
        $(".app-body").removeClass("slideInLeft");
        $(".app-body").addClass("animated");

        //$(".app-body").addClass("slideOutUp");

      });
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeSuccess", function(event, next, current) {
        //    alert('success');
        console.log("route change success");
        console.log("Event:");
        console.log(event);
        console.log("next:");
        console.log(next);
        console.log("current:");
        console.log(current);
        console.log(next.pathParams.appid);
        console.log("----------");
        if (next.pathParams.appid != "QuickLaunch4") {
          console.log("ql icon opacity restored")
          $('.divQuickLaunch img').css('opacity', '0.4');
          $('.divQuickLaunch').css('opacity', '0.4');
        }
        if (next.params.appid == 'SignIn2') {
          $(".app-body").addClass("slideInDown");
        } else {
          /*if (current.params.appid == next.params.appid && next.params.appid == next.params.pageid) {
          $(".app-body").addClass("slideInLeft");
          } else {
          $(".app-body").addClass("slideInRight");
          }*/
          console.log(MyCampusApp.rootScope.leftToRight);
          //alert(MyCampusApp.rootScope.leftToRight);
          if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.leftToRight) {
            $(".app-body").addClass("slideInLeft");
            MyCampusApp.rootScope.leftToRight = false;
          } else {
            $(".app-body").addClass("slideInRight");
          }
        }

        $(".app-body").addClass("animated");
        //$(".app-body").removeClass("slideOutUp");
      });
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded = true;
    }
  } catch (e) {
    alert(e)
  }
</script>

<script>
  try {
    $("#mainSidebar").css('background', '#232323 !important');

    if ($.jStorage.get("userdetails") != null && $.jStorage.get("userdetails") != undefined) {
      var e = document.getElementsByClassName("app")[0];
      var $injector = angular.element(e).injector();
      var $location = $injector.get('$location');
      //$location.path("/app/Home4/Home4");
      $location.path("/app/Menu82/Menu82");

    } else {
      var e = document.getElementsByClassName("app")[0];
      var $injector = angular.element(e).injector();
      var $location = $injector.get('$location');
      $location.path("/app/Menu82/Menu82");
    }
  } catch (e) {
    alert(e)
  }
</script>
<script>
  var onBackKeyDown = function(event) {
    //alert("event" + window.location);
    var loc = window.location;
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.leftToRight = true;
    if (loc.hash == "#/app/WhatsUp/WhatsUp" || loc.hash == "#/app/Menu82/Menu82") {
      navigator.app.exitApp();
    } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279") {
      window.location.href = "index.html#app/Menu82/Menu82";
      //alert("signuo");
    } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SocialNetworking/SocialNetworking") {
      window.location.href = "#/app/Menu82/Menu82";
      //window.location.href = "index.html#app/Menu82/Menu82";
      //alert("signuo");
    } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/TermsConditions2/TermsConditions2") {
      $location.path("/app/Banner9/Banner9");
      window.location.href = "index.html#app/Banner9/Banner9";
      //alert("signuoppp");
    } else {
      window.location.href = "#/app/Menu82/Menu82";
      // $location.path("/app/Menu82/Menu82");
      //navigator.app.backHistory();

    }
  }
  document.addEventListener("backbutton", onBackKeyDown, true);
</script>

<script>
  /*$('input:text').focusout(function() {

                                                  

                                                  $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('footerGroupIcons').removeClass('hideFooter');
                                                  $("#bottomPoweredBy").removeClass('hideFooter');

                                                });

                                                $('input:text').focusin(function() {
                                                  

                                                  $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('hideFooter').removeClass('footerGroupIcons');
                                                  $("#bottomPoweredBy").addClass('hideFooter');
                                                })*/
</script>
